mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , ROLE , USER_STATUS , NICKNAME , TOKEN_USE_AT FROM users WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( USER_ID , ROLE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , USER_STATUS , TOKEN_USE_AT ) VALUES( #{userId} , 'USER' , #{nickname} , '카카오유저' , 'Y' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT A.REFRESH_TOKEN FROM users A JOIN alarm_set B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID JOIN schedule C ON B.ALARM_ID = C.ALARM_ID JOIN med_info D ON C.MED_ID = D.MED_ID WHERE A.USER_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.TOKEN_USE_AT = 'Y' AND CURDATE() BETWEEN D.START_DATE AND D.END_DATE AND B.ALARM_TIME BETWEEN CURTIME() - INTERVAL 59 SECOND AND CURTIME() + INTERVAL 59 SECOND
